snippet: Mr. Kinsley will write a monthly column for Vanity Fair, which is likely to cover “what I’ve written about most of the time: politics, in one form or another,” he said.
abstract: Michael Kinsley will join Vanity Fair as a contributing editor, stepping down as editor at large of The New Republic; he will write a monthly column for Vanity Fair, which is likely to cover politics.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kinsley will write a monthly column for Vanity Fair, which is likely to cover “what I’ve written about most of the time: politics, in one form or another,” he said.

headline.main: Michael Kinsley to Join Vanity Fair and Write a Monthly Column
headline.print_headline: Kinsley to Join Vanity Fair as Columnist
